title: [Self-Directed] Effective Online Instructional Design Strategies through MOOC Characteristics Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical analysis and understanding of online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Course for graduate students in science fields to strengthen actual instructional design capabilities through quantitative and qualitative analysis of MOOC characteristics

learning_goals: Learners can explain science and technology course-taking trends by analyzing MOOC quantitative data (enrollment rate, completion rate).
Learners can evaluate the qualitative structure of MOOCs based on assessment tool utilization and propose improvement measures.
Learners can conceptualize an instructor-learner feedback system by applying real-time dashboard design principles.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
